title: Senate Democrats Blocked Watchdog for Ukraine Aid — Ignoring Lessons From Afghanistan
description:
The U.S. special inspector who monitored billions of dollars in U.S. waste in Afghanistan cautions about repeating the same mistakes in Ukraine.

The post Senate Democrats Blocked Watchdog for Ukraine Aid — Ignoring Lessons From Afghanistan appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Man With No Pants Is the Star of Donald Trump’s Latest Indictment
description:
Jeffrey Clark was an obscure government lawyer when he nearly seized control of the Justice Department to help the ex-president overturn the 2020 election results.

The post The Man With No Pants Is the Star of Donald Trump’s Latest Indictment appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Reformist DAs Sue Georgia Over Law to Remove Elected Prosecutors — Including One Probing Donald Trump
description:
Gov. Brian Kemp, whose commission will oversee local district attorneys, signed the law shortly after a prosecutor said she would pursue a Trump indictment.

The post Reformist DAs Sue Georgia Over Law to Remove Elected Prosecutors — Including One Probing Donald Trump appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Niger Mutiny: Another U.S.-Trained Military Officer Led Coup
description:
U.S.-trained military officers have taken part in 11 coups in West Africa since 2008.

The post Niger Mutiny: Another U.S.-Trained Military Officer Led Coup appeared first on The Intercept.
